link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/reference http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-reference.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2010/validation-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/filter/aspect-cover http://www.xbrl.org/2010/aspect-cover-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd

va:valueAssertion.test: count(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($energy))) eq 1 and count(xfi:unit-denominator(xfi:unit($energy))) eq 0 and xfi:measure-name(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($energy))[1]) eq QName('http://www.xbrl.org/2009/utr', 'MWh')

gen:link.msg:message: {concat("According to the Disclosure Requirement E1-5, paragraph 37 and 39 the '", xfi:concept-label(QName('https://xbrl.efrag.org/taxonomy/esrs/2023-12-22',fn:local-name($energy)), '', '', 'en'), "' should be reported in utr:MWh. The unit for the fact '", $energy, "' (", $energy/@id, ", ", if (xfi:is-duration-period(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($energy)))) then (concat(xsd:date(xfi:period-start(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($energy)))), " -> ", xsd:date(xfi:period-end(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($energy))))-xsd:dayTimeDuration('P1D'))) else(xsd:date(xfi:period-instant(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($energy))))-xsd:dayTimeDuration('P1D')), ") is set to ", xfi:measure-name(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($energy))[1]), " instead.")}

va:valueAssertion.test: count(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($volume))) eq 1 and count(xfi:unit-denominator(xfi:unit($volume))) eq 0 and xfi:measure-name(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($volume))[1]) eq QName('http://www.xbrl.org/2009/utr', 'm3')

gen:link.msg:message: {concat("According to the Disclosure Requirement E3-4, paragraph 28 and 29 the '", xfi:concept-label(QName('https://xbrl.efrag.org/taxonomy/esrs/2023-12-22',fn:local-name($volume)), '', '', 'en'), "' should be reported in utr:m3. The unit for the fact '", $volume, "' (", $volume/@id, ", ", if (xfi:is-duration-period(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($volume)))) then (concat(xsd:date(xfi:period-start(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($volume)))), " -> ", xsd:date(xfi:period-end(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($volume))))-xsd:dayTimeDuration('P1D'))) else(xsd:date(xfi:period-instant(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($volume))))-xsd:dayTimeDuration('P1D')), ") is set to ", xfi:measure-name(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($volume))[1]), " instead.")}

va:valueAssertion.test: count(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($ghgEmissions))) eq 1 and count(xfi:unit-denominator(xfi:unit($ghgEmissions))) eq 0 and xfi:measure-name(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($ghgEmissions))[1]) eq QName('http://www.xbrl.org/2009/utr', 'tCO2e')

gen:link.msg:message: {concat("According to the ESRS E1-4, E1-6, E1-7 and E1-8, the '", xfi:concept-label(QName('https://xbrl.efrag.org/taxonomy/esrs/2023-12-22',fn:local-name($ghgEmissions)), '', '', 'en'), "' should be reported in utr:tCO2e. The unit for the fact '", $ghgEmissions, "' (", $ghgEmissions/@id, ", ", if (xfi:is-duration-period(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($ghgEmissions)))) then (concat(xsd:date(xfi:period-start(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($ghgEmissions)))), " -> ", xsd:date(xfi:period-end(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($ghgEmissions))))-xsd:dayTimeDuration('P1D'))) else(xsd:date(xfi:period-instant(xfi:context-period(xfi:context($ghgEmissions))))-xsd:dayTimeDuration('P1D')), ") is set to ", xfi:measure-name(xfi:unit-numerator(xfi:unit($ghgEmissions))[1]), " instead.")}
